<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.5</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the additional integer value in the item with the given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user [[dialog]] to the given value. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetValue''' [idc, index, value] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index, value]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetValue''' [index, value] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, value]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] of control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSetValue]] [101, 0, 1];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lbSetValue]] [0, 1];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 21, 2014 - 02:19 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Fett Li|Fett Li]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
lbSetValue only accepts integer, no decimal number.<br>
Example:<br>
CONTROL lbSetValue [index,10]; // value will be 10<br>
CONTROL lbSetValue [index,3.1]; // value will be 3<br>
</dd>
</dl>
